parameter.name: BD_CRPEntities-Web.config Connection String
parameter.description: BD_CRPEntities Connection String used in web.config by the application to access the database.
parameter.defaultValue: metadata=res://*/CRPModel.csdl|res://*/CRPModel.ssdl|res://*/CRPModel.msl;provider=System.Data.SqlClient;provider connection string="data source=tcp:bdserverupc.database.windows.net,1433;initial catalog=BD_CRP;Persist Security Info=False;User ID=dsullon;Password=UPC-TP2017;MultipleActiveResultSets=False;Encrypt=True;TrustServerCertificate=False;Connection Timeout=30;App=EntityFramework"
